LA PAVONI ESPRESSO PLUS


EP Espresso Plus Silver


EPL Espresso Plus Lusso


La Pavoni, making quality espresso machines since 1905, is world-renowned for its exquisite espresso and cappuccino makers.
La Pavoni Espresso Plus espresso machine is pump-driven featuring an ultra quiet ULKA pump ideal for the early morning espresso enthusiast. It is fitted with an automatic pressurized filter holder in brass which guarantees a ''crema'' no matter what coffee grind is used. This is done by stopping the brewing process by means of a patented system enabling a pre-infusion of the coffee under pressure. This machine is also equipped with a coffee pod adaptor. Cappuccino frothing is both quick and easy thanks to the dual frothing system included. The Turbo attachment simplifies the traditional way of frothing milk and the Cappuccino Automatic attachment draws the cold milk from its container delivering it perfectly frothed and heated into your cup.

Turbo
Attachment
Cappuccino Automatic
Attachment
 
Specifications
  • automatic pressurized filter holder in brass
  • coffee pod adaptor
  • dual frothing system (Turbo attachment and Cappuccino Automatic attachment) which are easily removed for quick cleaning
  • features an ultra quiet ULKA pump
  • body is made of metal (EP) and brushed stainless steel (EPL)
   
   
TECHNICAL DATA
Tank Capacity 2.9 liters
Voltage 110V, 60 Hz
Absorption 950W
Dimensions (cm) (WxDxH) 22.5x26.5x29
Weight (kg) 7
Colours available EP - silver
EPL - stainless steel
The manufacturer reserves the right to modify the appliances without further notice.
